020package io.jenetics.ext;
021
022import io.jenetics.AbstractChromosome;
023import io.jenetics.util.ISeq;
024
025/**
026 * Abstract base implementation of a {@code TreeChromosome}.
027 *
028 * @author <a href="mailto:franz.wilhelmstoetter@gmail.com">Franz Wilhelmstötter</a>
029 * @version 5.2
030 * @since 3.9
031 */
032public abstract class AbstractTreeChromosome<A, G extends AbstractTreeGene<A, G>>
033        extends AbstractChromosome<G>
034        implements TreeChromosome<A, G>
035{
036
037        protected AbstractTreeChromosome(final ISeq<? extends G> genes) {
038                super(genes);
039                genes.forEach(g -> g.bind(this));
040        }
041
042}
